body_html:
Please post on the forums!

https://pytorch.org/docs/master/nn.html?highlight=lstm#torch.nn.LSTM

^ the docs say there should be two inputs. The first is input and the second is a tuple of tensors (h0, c0) that are the initial hidden and cell states

body:
Please post on the forums!

https://pytorch.org/docs/master/nn.html?highlight=lstm#torch.nn.LSTM

^ the docs say there should be two inputs. The first is `input` and the second is a tuple of tensors (h0, c0) that are the initial hidden and cell states
